attributes.action: agree to investigate the quality of Care & Treatment at Warrington & Halton Hospitals Foundation Trust.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The number of patients that have needlessly died or are not receiving the appropriate standards of  care or treatment can be drastically reduced by improving these areas.

The legacy of the relatives that have sadly passed will be that other future patients do not need to die needlessly and that good practice is developed from the lessons learnt.”
